description: Standardized manufacturer/brand name for equipment used across the fleet; primary value referenced by assets and lookups.
Human-readable display name or description of the make, often the full company or division name for clarity.
Likely an external manufacturer identifier or code associated with the make; confirm intended source/system and format with SME.
User ID or process that created the make record (e.g., conversion job or staff username).
Timestamp when the make record was first created.
User ID that last modified the make record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the make record.
